Luxury Appliance Repair in Burbank, CA

High-End Repairs with White-Glove Service in the Media Capital of the World

Burbank blends classic California charm with modern sophistication. From custom hillside homes with sweeping views to newly built estates in Magnolia Park, high-end living here means thoughtful design and premium appliances. When your high-performance appliance needs attention, trust the repair service that specializes in precision, discretion, and brand-specific expertise.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we provide certified appliance repair in Burbank for luxury brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Miele, Thermador, Viking, Gaggenau, La Cornue, and more. Our technicians are trained to deliver flawless results—backed by genuine parts and an experience that’s professional from beginning to end.

🔧 Why Burbank Homeowners Trust ZARICCI

  • ✅ Brand-Certified Luxury Repair Experts
    We understand the advanced technology and craftsmanship behind high-end appliances. From Wi-Fi-enabled steam ovens to panel-ready refrigerators and pro cooktops, our technicians are certified in all major luxury brands.
  • ✅ OEM Parts. No Shortcuts.
    We only use original manufacturer parts, so your appliance performs exactly as it should—no knockoffs, no guesswork.
  • ✅ Fast Scheduling for Burbank Homes
    We offer same-day and next-day appointments across Burbank, from the Rancho District to the Hillside neighborhoods. We arrive on time and fully prepared.
  • ✅ White-Glove Service
    Our technicians wear protective gear, maintain a clean workspace, and treat your home with the same respect and care your appliances were designed for.

🛠️ High-End Appliances We Repair in Burbank

❄️ Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Cooling problems, ice maker failure
  • Door not sealing, strange noises
  • Control panel malfunctions

🔥 Ovens, Ranges & Cooktops

  • Wolf, Gaggenau, La Cornue, Viking
  • Oven won’t heat or heats unevenly
  • Burner ignition issues
  • Smart tech glitches or error codes

🚿 Luxury Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Leaking, not draining, cycle errors
  • Unresponsive controls or display issues
  • Noisy operation or cleaning failure

🧺 Washer & Dryer Repairs

  • Miele, Fisher & Paykel, LG Signature
  • Drum won’t spin, dryer not heating
  • Unusual vibrations or smart sensor failures
  • Water not draining or control board issues

☕ Specialty Built-In Appliances

  • Wine coolers, espresso machines, warming drawers, smart hoods
  • Temperature issues, electrical failures
  • Integration or cabinetry fit repairs
  • Wi-Fi or app control failures

👨‍🔧 The ZARICCI Repair Process – Built for Luxury Homes

  1. Book Your Visit
    Call or schedule online—our team confirms your appointment and gathers essential appliance info.
  2. On-Time, Brand-Specific Diagnosis
    A certified ZARICCI technician arrives on time and performs a full, respectful inspection of your appliance.
  3. Clear, Honest Estimate
    We present a detailed quote covering parts, labor, and expected completion—no pressure, no surprises.
  4. Expert Repairs with Authentic Parts
    Using OEM components, we complete the repair with expert precision and retest every function before leaving.
  5. Clean Finish & Warranty
    We leave your space spotless and back our repair with a satisfaction guarantee for peace of mind.
